ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the International Letter-post Items Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the INTERNATIONAL LETTER-POST ITEMS REGULATIONS, by increasing the rates of postage for letter-post items destined for the United States and other international destinations, effective January 17, 2011. The new rates will directly contribute to Canada Postâ€™s financial integrity and its ability to make future investments to maintain an accessible, affordable and efficient postal service.
